name: powershell-profile-data-conversions
description: Global npm packages required for PowerShell profile data format conversions

scripts.install-all: pnpm run install-all-global || pnpm run install-all-local
scripts.install-all-global: pnpm run install-js-global && pnpm run install-python-global
scripts.install-all-local: pnpm run install-js-local && pnpm run install-python-local
scripts.install-js-global: pnpm add -g bson @msgpack/msgpack cbor protobufjs avsc flatbuffers thrift superjson json5 parquetjs apache-arrow base32-encode base32-decode qrcode uuid jsonwebtoken
scripts.install-js-local: pnpm add bson @msgpack/msgpack cbor protobufjs avsc flatbuffers thrift superjson json5 parquetjs apache-arrow base32-encode base32-decode qrcode uuid jsonwebtoken
scripts.install-python-global: uv pip install --system h5py netCDF4 numpy
scripts.install-python-local: uv pip install --user h5py netCDF4 numpy
